page.title: 17Senior Citizens
page.content: The Senior Citizens of Caldicot are well looked after. Many of them live in bungalows on a complex attended by wardens. This means that they have their independence and also the companionship of their friends. There are two complexes at Wiesental Close and Margaret's Way and a residential home at Brookside. In Sandy Lane there is a Senior Citizens Day Luncheon Centre where hot meals are served three days a week. A similar service is available at the Leisure Centre. The elderly also use the Leisure Centre for social events such as Bingo. For house-bound people there is a 'meals on wheels' service on Mondays and Wednesdays.
